about_the_game:
This game is a free independent short narrative game. We hope to bring players a unique immersive experience through a concise and profound plot. Although the game time is not long, we have devoted our efforts to every detail. Thank you for taking the time to enter our world. We hope that your journey can arouse some touching and thinking in you.

Story summary

My father retired, and he, who had been living with his mother, finally had some free time. I thought it would be better to go find my children who were far away, and they just happened to move back to Beijing. The mother was unwilling to leave this rural town, but her daughter persuaded the mother to finally leave.

"My father and mother visited their daughter's home in Beijing. They talked about my father's understanding of his own belonging and the memories he had with his wife in the past."

Although the family members in the past memories are separated by a long distance, they feel the warmth during the two phone calls apart.

But the two people who came to Beijing felt that distant village

Game features

Story style of literature in the 1990s

Advance the plot through dialogue and exploration

Beautiful hand-drawn art style

Operation mode

WASD: moving character

Enter: confirm/select

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo E6600 @ 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel 4400, GeForce GT 8800, AMD Radeon HD 4650
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400s @ 2.5 GHz or AMD FX-6350 @ 3.9 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD R9 280X
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Father and mother visited their daughter's home in Beijing to discuss their father's understanding of life and memories of their past relationship with their mother. The Story of Chinese Families
